channel.title: For the Hardstyle fans
channel.description:
This is a rip from a radio broadcast back in 2004. The radio station allowed users to download the live sets, so no worries over copyrights (Not that anyone would really care, but there's rules). This is early, Italian hardstyle; the way it should be played. Very good set, brought back so many memories when I found it on my old hard drive today. It's ripped in flac, so expect a large filesize and insane quality. [b]Contents on Info.txt:[/b]

Audio Damage - Garlic Breath Tosser (T.G Remix) # # 02. Radium - Im The Hardstyle Pimp (T.G. Loves Little Tits Mix) # # 03. Simon J. Bergher ft. Maxime J. - The End Is Important (Trance Generators Remix) # # 04. Blutonium Boy - Paranoid (Blutonium Massaka Sound) # # 05. Radium - Back Again For Bang (Trance Generators Remix) # # 06. Trance Generators - Bang The Drums # # 07. Trance Generators - Wildstyle Generation (Original Mix) # # 08. Trance Generators - Darkness Will Rule (Original Mix) # # 08. Showtek - Save the Day Again (Trance Generators Remix) # # 09. Unknown/Unreleased Track # # # # MD5SUM: 99f03b1092250459c5ceb1f8d63dc5a0 # #######################################################################################
